title: If Ohmwrecker could empower allied towers.
body:
Say, giving them AOE damage or just increasing their single-target damage (or maybe.. {{champion:222}} some COOL debuff)
What would change and would that be imbalanced? (we're not talking numbers)

I personally think Ohmwrecker could use a buff after the 0 ap nerf to it. I always thought of it as a support item but now that Riot removed some of the offensives stats the item gave, I think there should be some room for a utility compensation. The item already is pretty good for the active but, it does come with some sacrifice. As a mage support you risk any kind of scaling for shields, heals, etc. and as a tank sup you miss out on other items that offer better utility and better tank stats. I think adding a defensive mechanism to it would be a really balanced and well deserved addition to the item.

That would be a cool addition, but ultimately it might not solve the core issue with {{item:3056}}, which is that it feels too weak too early, and caters to a system that's already fairly easy to handle without the need for a dedicated item. Currently, tower dives are already feasible at level 4 and onwards, and turrets in general feel like they fall off really hard within the first few minutes of the game, without ever gaining relevance later on. For Ohmwrecker to feel like a good purchase, whether it's for disabling enemy towers or buffing allied defenses, turrets need to feel worth investing an item in, and so would need to feel stronger (though they wouldn't necessarily have to be just statistically better, as buffing them the wrong way could end up stalling games for too long).

Out of the ideas I think the "control tower" is best. When cast on your own tower the tower would attack any champ's that attack it.

I wanna say yes, but I dunno. o.o It would become a staple item for sure. A tanky support with an Ohm and a Banner of Command would be a bit scary. D: Stop a turret, make his own turret do more, and super siege minions.

Giving it some sort of tower buff would actually make this item so much better because then it becomes an anti-siege tool rather than having no real niche in the game.

Live Ohmwrecker has a "niche" of being the go-to item for players who want to towerdive, but it falls short of that niche because its defensive bonuses already help make towers tickle you more (rather than doing relevant damage to you). So it really doesn't have the niche it is supposed to provide.

With this kind of buff (eg. increasing single-target damage or dealing AoE damage), it becomes so much more relevant because it can be used to help stop a team trying to push your own turrets. This gives it a cool niche compared to other tank items, and helps it stand out more.

Only problem I see is that the losing team having someone with Ohmwrecker might force the other team to get an Ohmwrecker to get through the opposing team's turret, but as long as Ohmwrecker has a long enough cooldown on a turret it shouldn't be a problem.
